Name: Praline Pecan Pie
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Reminiscent of a pecan-flavoured Sweet Manhattan.
History: Created in December 2010 by Cheri Loughlin, The Intoxicologist, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Praline Pecan Pie contains 212 calories
